paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant lle68Leu, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: carrier of the mutation, presented with cardiac symptoms

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Following his father’s diagnosis of a variant cardiac amyloidosis, a 39-year-old Caucasian male was identified as a carrier of the mutation lle68Leu in the transthyretin (TTR) gene.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with cardiac amyloidosis, but the patient presented with cardiac sarcoidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is present in the patient with a family history of cardiac amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of cardiac amyloidosis, which may suggest a hereditary component.
key_quotes: Following his father’s diagnosis of a variant cardiac amyloidosis, a 39-year-old Caucasian male was identified as a carrier of the mutation lle68Leu in the transthyretin (TTR) gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the text.
